name.en: Heartless Hound Striking Kai Ken Knuckle
name.ja: <ruby>邪<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby><ruby>犬<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>闘<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>打<rt>だ</rt></ruby>カイケンナックル

text.en: A young Heartless Hound who is extremely motivated, but also pretty reckless. The strength of his grip is... so-so.
text.ja: やる気に満ち溢れ無茶をしがちな若手筆頭の邪犬。握力はボチボチ。

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Requiem of Destruction!!
